teacher_info.intro:
我喜欢旅游，热爱教育，擅长和孩子沟通，能很快了解他们的心理活动，帮助他们培养良好的学习和行为习惯，在中国，很多孩子的父母喜欢向我咨询如何正确教育孩子，我也乐于解答他们遇到的问题。
 I'm a person who likes traveling, and my passions for education is trememdous, I'm good at communicating with children, can connect with them in a short period of time,  I helped a lot of children cultivate a good studying and behavioral habits,  even now a lot of parents of chilren who I've taught like to consult with me about education, and I've been very pleased to help them with the problems they come across when edcating kids.

Hello， everyone！I'm Una from China. I'm a Ph.D student in Shenzhen. I love learning languages and  I love teaching Chinese. I've already been teaching Chinese on italki for 5 years, so I'm very experienced in teaching Chinese, no matter you are a beginner or Kids or already fluent in speaking Chinese but still want to improve yourself, I can help you. I am very patience and humorous, you won't feel nervous during our class.

Hi, I'm Anna. 大家好，我是安娜。It's my pleasure to meet all of you here. I'm a native Chinese speaker and a professional Chinese teacher with 10 years' experience, currently working in Italy. I enjoy my teaching job just like how I enjoy travelling, drawing and practising calligraphy.
I'm fluent in English and Italian. So, if you're looking for a teacher who can understand you well, I may be your first pick. I'm a language learner before a teacher. I understand that the reason you learn a language is to grab a tool to see the new world. I'm also happy to share with you my experience and some tips for living in a foreign country if you also consider going to a new country after the pandemic.

大家好，我叫侯佳慧，来自中国大连，毕业于大连交通大学，专业是日语和软件。
大学二年级开始教授外国人汉语五年时间，学到很多优秀的精神。
我现在工作在大连国际机场，爱好是跳舞和跑步还有打羽毛球，参加过多次文艺汇演和马拉松赛事。
很高兴在这个平台和来自全世界各地的语言爱好者交流。

Hello, everyone. My name is Hou Jiahui. I am from the north of China Dalian. I have graduated from Dalian Jiaotong University, majored in Japanese and software.
In the second year of college, I began teaching foreigners Chinese for five years, and I learned many excellent spirits.
I am working at Dalian International Airport now. I like dancing and running, playing badminton, and participating in many art shows and marathons.
It is a great pleasure to talk with language enthusiasts from all over the world on this platform.

Exam week from 12/04-22/04. Wait me back!!
Hello everyone, My name is Mu Yun. My native language is Chinese. I come from Ningbo, an important port city in China. This is a beautiful city with a very long history. I am currently studying in France and I speak French and English. I know the difficulties of learning languages. The most important thing to learn a new language is the language environment. I like photography, travel, playing badminton, etc. I have traveled to many cities and I like food very much. I hope to share it with you.

Hello, everyone! My name is Cathy. I live in Shanghai and I am a native Mandarin speaker. 
I have the certificate of qualification as a senior Chinese language teacher from IPA.  I also hold a BA in Communication and Marketing from The University of Hebei in China, and an MA in Sociology from The University of Essex in the UK.  
I have been working with different countries people and communicated people from different cultures. We can talk about different topics and share our opinions to each other.

Hello everyone, I am Samantha, Mandarin is my mother tongue, and I am from Guangzhou, China. I like learning languages. My university majored in language education and minored in French. I am very grateful to my French teacher for her teaching and encouragement to help me overcome various difficulties in French and let me understand how to overcome the difficulties in learning foreign languages. This made me naturally acquire Cantonese after working. I love music and learn vocal music from childhood; I also love brush calligraphy and traveling.

Hi,there! My name is Wenjin Xu, native Chinese, and your Chinese teacher who loves to share and tell.
I would like to be your tutor and also friend. We may make progress together on Chinese language learning and Chinese culture sharing.
我的中文全名是许文瑾，我是土生土长的中国人。我从我的朋友了解到italki这个平台，所以我现在有意愿通过这个平台和全世界对中文和中国文化感兴趣的朋友们分享并且一起进步。

hi,everyone! my name is shilan. i'm from china,and now i'm still a college student in the chongqing university. i really like traveling, learning more about different cultures and make friends from all over the world.
嗨，大家好。我叫诗岚，来自中国重庆，现在是一名重庆大学的在校大学生。我很喜欢旅游，了解不同的文化以及认识世界各地的朋友。

I‘m a big fan of Chinese classical dance and stretching. I'm not only a language teacher, but also a dance teacher. I really enjoy sharing my interests with others. Besides, I'm also a dog lover so that I raise an Australian shepherd. There is another necessary part in my life, which is food. I have a universal stomach, Chinese food, French, Thai, Indian, Mexican, Korean...I'm really a big fan of all of them!!!

I was born and raised in China, I finished my bachelor degree in capital city Beijing, and am currently pursuing my research-based master degree in Canada, I build models for predicting future climate effects on forest tree growth. I love dogs, photography, architecture, traveling and films. I often spend time on exercising in gym and catching sunset at beaches in my city.

Hello everybody! I am native Chinese speaker from Taiwan. My interest in teaching Chinese as a foreign language arose a few years ago, I came across several people who were interested in my language and they asked me questions about the logic behind the language which I had never thought about the structure behind it. That picked my curiosity, so I decided to enroll in courses to teach Chinese as a foreign language. Since then I have developed a profound understanding of my mother language and how it should be taught to non-native students. I believe that Chinese language is a fascinating subject itself as well as a key to understand the culture, the people, the society and the economy.

I am  55 years old. Majoring in Chinese language,I also participate in different areas work. But most time  I work as a teacher, I teach Chinese.
I intereste in Geography, Geology, Architecte, History,Archaeology,Literature. I like travel too.

This is Yuci, I'm from Beijing and now live in Edinburgh. Friendly, cheerful, and patient may describe me well, most of the time. Also, I'm open-minded, curious, and always being ready for other perspectives. I love art and music, I'm good at painting and singing. If you like, I can even teach you how to cook decent Chinese cuisine, while practising Mandarin (definitely not the takeaway stuff). I’m happy to take lessons in the way you prefer and be a encouraging companion along your language learning journey :)
我叫Lily，中国人，母语是普通话。1976年在一所小学教语文和数学约一年。中国恢复高考后，考入哈尔滨一所大学工科专业，大学毕业后在美丽的四川成都的一所College当教师三年。再次上大学学习，1986年毕业于汉语言专业。7年前通过考试获得国际对外汉语教师资格证，从此我开始对外汉语教学工作。

Hello! My name is Yidan and I teach Mandarin Chinese with italki. I am from Jiangsu, China. I graduated with a first-class Bachelor's degree in Communication and Media from the University of Liverpool. In Autumn, I will start a masters in Oxford. In my free time, I enjoy Salsa dancing, Belly Dancing and playing the recorder. I also like reading and listening to podcasts on psychology and culture, so you can talk about a lot of topics with me. In China, I enjoyed using language exchanges to practice my English and meet new people from all over the world. I will listen to you and talk to you as a friend. And as a teacher, I can correct your mistakes and patiently explain them to you.

大家好！我叫钟灵，来自中国深圳，我的母语是普通话和粤语。我线下已经有7年的教学经验，我是一名专业的对外汉语老师且有国际对外汉语教师资格证。希望可以帮助热爱中文的伙伴们。我热爱交流和旅游。
I am native speaker of Mandarin Chinese, but Cantonese and Hakka dialect also are my native languages. And I speak some English. 
I Like make friends and  enjoy talking with different people from different countries with different cultures.

Hello there, My name is Angel. I was born and raised in Tianjin, China. After finishing my undergraduate in Madison WI, I moved to NYC and worked there for a year. Now, I live in Pittsburgh and study for my master degree. I speak some French. I backpacked to South America for a couples times. And I love dancing!

➡️Hey guys, I'm back! I hope everyone stays safe and healthy, see you soon^^

Hello! 你好nǐ hǎo! Olá！I'm Rosa, from China. My native language is Chinese(Mandarin and Cantonese). Many people in southern China have a strong accent when they speak Mandarin…but, not me! My Mandarin pronunciation is standard, clear, and easy to understand. I used to record welcome ringtones for calls from a travel company, and I am also recording Chinese dubbing for some companies.

I have been living in Brazil for about five years. I do understand your feeling and difficulties when you start to learn a new language. And I have gained a lot of experience along the way, which will help you take fewer detours.

✨New Lesson [ Wenzhounese ] ✨

Hi, I'm Chacha, born in Wenzhou, Zhejiang. Now working and living in Shanghai as an Internet company employee. I’ve been studying in Dalian for four years. 

I have many hobbies, coffee, movies, tv-series, rock bands, animations, paintings, games. I love cats！Now I have two cats, they’re both adopted. On weekends, I participate in some adoption activities to help street cats and dogs find a new sweet home. I worked for 2 pet companies for several years, so if you have any questions about pets, feel free to book my lesson.

こんにちは！私はチャチャです。
今は、上海に住んています。
2匹猫を飼いて、4歳の黒川くんと2歳のユキちゃんです。
日本のアニメとドラマとゲームを大好き！
それから、今まで日本語を勉強しています。
そして、中国語を勉強の問題は、わかります！
じゃあ、一緒に勉強しましょう！
